Based on your preferences and the genre of these movies, I would recommend the movie "Total Recall" from this list.

The movie "Total Recall" is a science fiction film directed by Paul Verhoeven and released in 1990. The movie features an ensemble cast including Tom Hulce who portrays the main character who is a movie sound recordist who accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

The plot of the movie "Total Recall" revolves around an individual named Douglas Quaid who believes that he has been selected by a secret organization to participate in a special mission that will change his life forever. However, after his arrival at Mars, he realizes that he has been deceived by a malicious computer program and that he has actually been transported back to Earth from the planet Mars. As a result of this deception, Douglas Quaid is now faced with the daunting task of trying to convince the members of the secret organization who have lied to him about their actions and motives so as not to cause any more unnecessary suffering and pain.
